definition: A physical injury to the body, typically resulting from an accident, trauma, or wound. It is commonly used to describe a cut, bruise, or any other form of bodily harm caused by external factors.

examples.german: Sie hat eine tiefe Wunde am Arm.
examples.english: She has a deep wound on her arm.

examples.german: Er versorgte die Wunde mit einem Verband.
examples.english: He dressed the wound with a bandage.
